short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live scores from all around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live matches from all football leagues have fast and accurate updates for minutes, scores, halftime and full time football results, goal scorers and assistants, cards, substitutions. This extension offers livescore.
